meta.title: ProCode Ind — Professional code industry
meta.description: Tailored tech solutions: from simple apps to complex enterprise architectures, with cloud deployments that truly scale.

hero.headline: From concept to cloud: software that scales with you
hero.sub: From simple apps to complex platforms: robust backends, microservices and cloud to power your business in fintech, SaaS, AI and digital ecosystems.

a.title: Architecture & Cloud
a.desc: Architecture design and deployment: Blueprints, Kubernetes, CI/CD, observability and cost optimization.

b.title: Full-Stack Development
b.desc: Complete web and mobile solutions: modern frontends, scalable APIs, and robust databases integrated with the latest technologies.

c.title: Products that Sell
c.desc: Market-ready solutions: POS, e-commerce and web/mobile apps focused on delivering results.

architecture.title: Architecture & Platform
architecture.desc: We design platforms, standards and pipelines to scale multi-tenant, cloud-native and secure products.

factory.title: Product Factory
factory.desc: We build software production lines with CI/CD, automated QA and observability from day one.

consulting.title: Strategic Consulting
consulting.desc: High-impact interventions in architecture, performance, cloud costs and modernization.

cta.title: Let's talk about your platform
cta.desc: Let's build together a future-ready platform: cloud-native, observable and with end-to-end automation.

future.title: Moving forward together
future.body: ProCode Ind is a code industry. You bring the problem; we provide the infrastructure, processes and technical focus to build software solutions that scale with you.

contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: Have a project in mind? Let's talk about how we can help you build the perfect solution.
contact.name: Name
contact.success: Message sent successfully! We'll contact you soon.
contact.error: Error sending message. Please try again.
contact.privacy: By submitting you accept that we contact you regarding your request.

footer.col1: From idea to product: architecture, development and cloud for projects of any scale.
